author: Phil Lewis
title: Introducing Empowa
description: A severe housing backlog in Africa (50 million units) & lack of property wealth, compounded by financial exclusion & growing urbanisation
solution: Empowa will be a unique decentralised property funding platform, empowering global communities to elevate living conditions & create wealth
experience: Founders have complementary experience implementing creative on-the-ground African property developments & large scale software platforms
